item.description:
This event is for our EN-ER-GY guests, new students, current class and practice members.

This Thursday's Practice Session will move to this Park on June 16th.

This will be our "Finally It's Summer" Set open to all steppers that regularly attend The Den practice sessions only.

The venue is outdoors, open gazebo with covered top. Dress appropriately for weather conditions, it will occur rain or shine. Wear your Steppers of Boston shirts and gear. The dance floor is polished stone, comfy shoes are a must. Bring your lawn chair and snacks if you like.

We may draw a few spectators, of those folks that just happen to be walking by at the time. Membership to our club has it's privileges.

 

Please RSVP... we need an accurate headcount. PLEASE BRING THE LARGEST/BRIGHTEST FLASHLIGHT YOU HAVE WITH FRESH BATTERIES. THE SUN MAY SET BEFORE WE ARE DONE. THIS WILL BE A BLAST STEPPIN' WITH A BUNCH OF FLASH LIGHTS AIMED AT THE FLOOR.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me wearing my Stepper's shirt & listen for the steppin' tunes

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Annual Steppin' on Common Ground 6/16/11 - 6pm - Class & Practice
